mapper.insert: insert into o_order_master (ORDER_ID, ORDER_SN, TRANSATION_NO, CUSTOMER_ID, PAY_TYPE, PAY_TIME, ORDER_MONEY, DISTRICT_MONEY, PAY_MONEY, CREATE_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_POINT, INVOICE_TITLE, INVOICE_NO, MODIFIED_TIME) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{districtMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{orderPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update o_order_master set ORDER_SN = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSATION_NO = #{transationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=BIT}, PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_MONEY = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISTRICT_MONEY = #{districtMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_MONEY = #{payMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIVE_TIME = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ORDER_POINT = #{orderPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INVOICE_TITLE = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_NO = #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORDER_ID, ORDER_SN, TRANSATION_NO, CUSTOMER_ID, PAY_TYPE, PAY_TIME, ORDER_MONEY, DISTRICT_MONEY, PAY_MONEY, CREATE_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_POINT, INVOICE_TITLE, INVOICE_NO, MODIFIED_TIME from o_order_master where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ORDER_ID, ORDER_SN, TRANSATION_NO, CUSTOMER_ID, PAY_TYPE, PAY_TIME, ORDER_MONEY, DISTRICT_MONEY, PAY_MONEY, CREATE_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_POINT, INVOICE_TITLE, INVOICE_NO, MODIFIED_TIME from o_order_master
